name: PDV revised
summary: revised, fixed and more featured version of pdv
description:
originally the 2005 PDV phpDocumentor for VIM tool (http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1355)

- fixed bugs w/ parameters not finding booleans
- added folding marker comment functionality
install_details:
inoremap <C-P> <ESC>:call PhpDocSingle()<CR>i
nnoremap <C-P> :call PhpDocSingle()<CR>
vnoremap <C-P> :call PhpDocRange()<CR>
